sentences.en: Ask the receptionist to put your call through to my room.
sentences.cn: 让接待员把你的电话接到我房间.

sentences.en: He had the duty receptionist almost jumping through hoops for him. But to no avail.
sentences.cn: 值班的接待员几乎为他费尽了力气，但还是没用。

sentences.en: He looked at the receptionist and wagged his tail, then walked over to the sign, looked at it and whined.
sentences.cn: 他先是对着接待员摇尾巴，然后走到启事那边，看着那则启事呦呦地叫。

sentences.en: If you really want a job as a graphic designer but work as a receptionist, you can spin a lot of your experience to make it relevant.
sentences.cn: 如果你真的很想找一份图像设计师的工作，而你现在的工作却是接待员，你可以把你的很多经验都改造成相关经验。

sentences.en: Receptionist : Sir, please follow me to Examination Room Number Three.
sentences.cn: 接待员: 请跟我到第三检查室.

sentences.en: Receptionist: Do you have Ontario Health Insurance?
sentences.cn: 接待员: 你有安大略省医疗保险 吗 ?

sentences.en: Receptionist: Mr Parker. Mr Dashan is here.
sentences.cn: 接待员: 帕克先生, 大山先生到了.

sentences.en: She is a receptionist in a doctor's office.
sentences.cn: 她在一位医生的诊所中担任接待员.

sentences.en: So why are so many people hoping to be its receptionist?
sentences.cn: 那么，为何会有如此多的人想去当它的接待员呢？ ？

sentences.en: The girl doubled as secretary and receptionist.
sentences.cn: 那女孩兼做秘书和招待员.

sentences.en: The girl is a receptionist of the Beijing Hotel.
sentences.cn: 这个女孩是北京饭店的前台接待员.

sentences.en: The hotel receptionist wants to know when we will be checking out tomorrow morning.
sentences.cn: 旅馆招待员想知道我们明天早上什么时候离开.

sentences.en: The personnel manager has been casting about for somebody who can act as receptionist.
sentences.cn: 人事部经理一直在到处物色接待员的人选.

sentences.en: The receptionist recognized him at once.
sentences.cn: 接待员一眼就认出他了。

sentences.en: The receptionist was less than ( ie not at all ) helpful when we arrived.
sentences.cn: 我们到达的时候接待员 什 麽忙也不帮.

sentences.en: Visitors should inform the receptionist of their arrival.
sentences.cn: 来宾在到达时应当知会接待员.

sentences.en: When it is Ms. Zhang's turn , she registers with the receptionist.
Where's that fool of a receptionist?
sentences.cn: 那个笨蛋接待员在什麽地方?

sentences.en: You tell the receptionist that you are expecting a call from this client and to put them through.
sentences.cn: 你告诉传达员你正在等待一个来自这个客户的电话，并允许将他们接进来。

words.tran_cn: 被一般承认的；被认为标准的
接待；接收；招待会；感受；反应
接受能力；[生理] 感受性
收到；接受；迎接（receive的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to welcome and deal with people arriving in a hotel or office building, visiting a doctor etc
